name: Monster Bash (itch) (Skynemu, DeepZombieToot, jamesd5)
description:
You are a newly spawned demon and humans are already coming to vanquish you from their world. Defend yourself by building a larger and larger base! 

Retry button is known to cause errors. Please refresh page to start over.

Everything was made by scratch! The Game, Art & Music! (Excluding the Font TheleahFat)

Cards: 

Basic tower: shoots fast and deals decent damage

splash tower: slow but can hit multiple enemies

mana tower: gives one extra mana

Wall: Your best defensive tool

Health card: heals all towers and gives them +1 max hp

Freeze tower: large aoe slow
